```{r}

base_path <- "data/temp/"
testing_paths_1Br <- list.files(base_path, pattern="MRP_1Br_testing")
testing_paths_2Br <- list.files(base_path, pattern="MRP_2Br_testing")

z$date <- as.Date(z$date)
z$train_end_date <- as.Date(z$train_end_date)

z <- extract_testing_RMSE_SD("MRP_1Br_MoM", testing_paths_1Br)

z$months_in_future <- cut(as.numeric(z$days_in_future), breaks=seq(from=1, to=365, length.out=13), labels=c(1:12))
ggplot(data=filter(z, days_in_future <= 365),
       aes(x=months_in_future, y=full_rf_RMSE, group=months_in_future)) +
  geom_boxplot() #+ 
  #scale_color_viridis(discrete = TRUE)
```
